mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_board_list (icategory, iuser, title, ctnt) VALUES (${icategory}, ${iuser}, #{title}, #{ctnt})
mapper.select: SELECT A.iboard, A.notice, A.title, B.nm AS writerNm FROM t_board_list A INNER JOIN t_user B ON A.iuser = B.iuser WHERE A.icategory = ${icategory} ORDER BY iboard DESC
SELECT A.iboard, A.icategory, A.title, A.ctnt, A.iuser, A.rdt , B.nm AS writerNm FROM t_board_list A LEFT JOIN t_user B ON A.iuser = B.iuser WHERE iboard = ${iboard}
